starters.title: Start here
starters.description: Set out on your journey by building your own website, then move on to multiplayer games and collaborative web apps.

web.title: Web development
web.description: Learn how to make things happen on the web, from basic JavaScript to web APIs, with HTML/CSS/JS.

advancedweb.title: Advanced web development
advancedweb.description: Learn popular frontend JavaScript frameworks like React and Vue, which are used by companies like Facebook and Google.

games.title: Game development
games.description: Learn to build games, both locally and on the web!

bots.title: Chat bots
bots.description: Make all sorts of bots for popular platforms such as Discord & Slack.

python.title: Python
python.description: Learn to use one of the most powerful and beginner-friendly languages.

ml.title: Machine learning
ml.description: Learn how to make machines learn with these fun projects!

hardware.title: Hardware
hardware.description: Bring projects from cyberspace to the real world with Arduinos and more.

cybersec.title: Cybersecurity
cybersec.description: Learn about cybersecurity and finding vulnerabilities in systems.
